sqlMap.statement: SELECT SRCH_OPT_PK ,SRCH_OPT_NM FROM SAVE_SRCH_OPT WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SRCH_OPT_APL_ID = #srchOptAplId# AND SRCH_OPT_USR_ID = #srchOptUsrId# AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY SRCH_OPT_NM
SELECT ORD_AGING_BCKT_CD ,ORD_AGING_BCKT_DESC_TXT FROM ORD_AGING_BCKT WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY ORD_AGING_BCKT_SORT_NUM

SELECT SLTC.DS_ACCT_NM FROM SHIP_TO_CUST STC ,SELL_TO_CUST SLTC WHERE STC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND STC.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD LIKE #shipToCustCd# AND STC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND STC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SLTC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND STC.SELL_TO_CUST_CD = SLTC.SELL_TO_CUST_CD AND SLTC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
SELECT CARR_NM FROM OTBD_CARR_V WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CARR_CD LIKE #carrCd# AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SHPG_SVC_LVL_CARR_RELN WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD = #pickUpSvcLvlCd# AND CARR_CD = #carrCd# AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
SELECT SP.PSN_FIRST_NM || ' ' || SP.PSN_LAST_NM FULL_NM FROM S21_PSN SP WHERE SP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SP.PSN_CD = #psnCd# AND SP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT RH.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK ,CPO.CPO_ORD_NUM ,DCRDV.DPLY_LINE_NUM ,RH.RWS_NUM ,RD.RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM ,RD.RTL_WH_CD AS RTL_WH_CD ,RW.RTL_WH_NM AS RTL_WH_NM ,RD.RTL_SWH_CD AS RTL_SWH_CD ,SLTC.SELL_TO_CUST_CD ,RH.FROM_LOC_NM_01 AS DS_ACCT_NM ,RH.FROM_LOC_ST_CD AS FROM_LOC_ST_CD ,RH.FROM_LOC_PSN_NM AS FROM_LOC_PSN_NM ,RD.MDSE_CD AS MDSE_CD ,MDSE.MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT ,RD.RWS_QTY AS RWS_QTY ,DCRDV.SER_NUM ,CPO.ORD_BOOK_TS , TO_CHAR ( TO_TIMESTAMP (CPO.ORD_BOOK_TS, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3'),'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS ORD_BOOK_TS_DPLY_TXT ,OAB.ORD_AGING_BCKT_DESC_TXT ,RD.RTRN_TRK_NTFY_GRP_CD ,RTNG.RTRN_TRK_NTFY_GRP_DESC_TXT ,RD.SCHD_PICK_UP_DT
,RD.SCHD_PICK_UP_TM ,RD.TECH_MEET_TRUCK_FLG
,RD.CARR_RSN_CD ,CR.CARR_RSN_DESC_TXT ,RD.ACTL_PICK_UP_DT ,RD.INSP_CPLT_DT ,CASE WHEN BPL.EZINTIME IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(BPL.EZINTIME,1, 14), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') ELSE NULL END AS ORD_CLO_DT_TM_TS_TXT ,RD.CARR_CD ,V.LOC_NM AS CARR_NM ,DOC.DS_ORD_CATG_CD ,DOC.DS_ORD_CATG_DESC_TXT ,DOP.DS_ORD_TP_CD ,DOP.DS_ORD_TP_DESC_TXT ,DCRDV.DS_ORD_LINE_CATG_DESC_TXT ,DCRDV.RTRN_LINE_DPLY_STS_DESC_TXT ,RD.RTRN_TRK_STS_CD ,RTS.RTRN_TRK_STS_DESC_TXT
,ST.FSR_NUM AS FSR_NUM ,ST.SVC_TASK_RCV_DT AS SVC_TASK_RCV_DT ,ST.SVC_TASK_RCV_TM AS SVC_TASK_RCV_TM
,NULL AS PROD_RMV_DT ,NULL AS REL_MEMO_TXT ,DRS.RWS_STS_DESC_TXT AS RWS_DTL_STS_DESC_TXT ,NVL(RC.RWS_CLO_DT_TM_TS, RH.RWS_CLO_DT_TM_TS) AS RWS_CLO_DT_TM_TS ,CASE WHEN RC.RWS_CLO_DT_TM_TS IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(RC.RWS_CLO_DT_TM_TS, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') WHEN RH.RWS_CLO_DT_TM_TS IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(RH.RWS_CLO_DT_TM_TS, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') ELSE NULL END AS RWS_CLO_DT_TM_TS_TXT ,DCRDV.RQST_PICK_UP_DT ,RD.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD ,SSL.SHPG_SVC_LVL_DESC_TXT ,CPO.CARR_ACCT_NUM ,CASE WHEN RD.SCHD_COORD_PSN_CD IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN PSN.PSN_LAST_NM IS NULL THEN PSN.PSN_FIRST_NM WHEN PSN.PSN_FIRST_NM IS NULL THEN PSN.PSN_LAST_NM ELSE PSN.PSN_FIRST_NM || ' ' || PSN.PSN_LAST_NM END AS SCHD_COORD_PSN_NM ,SCS.SCHD_COORD_STS_DESC_TXT ,MN.T_MDL_NM ,RH.FROM_LOC_CD AS FROM_LOC_CD ,RH.FROM_LOC_CTY_ADDR AS FROM_LOC_CTY_ADDR ,CASE WHEN HRS.RWS_OPEN_FLG = #flgOff# THEN #flgOff# WHEN DRS.RWS_OPEN_FLG = #flgOff# THEN #flgOff# ELSE #flgOn# END AS OPEN_ST_FLG ,CASE WHEN RH.PICK_UP_RQST_FLG = #flgOn# THEN #flgOn# WHEN RH.PICK_UP_RQST_TS IS NOT NULL THEN #flgOn# ELSE #flgOff# END AS SEND_REQ_FLG ,CT.MAN_SEND_RQST_FLG ,DCRDV.RTRN_RSN_CD ,DCRDV.SHIP_TO_POST_CD
,DCRDV.SHIP_TO_CTRY_CD
,RH.RWS_REF_NUM ,RH.EZUPTIME AS EZUPTIME_RH ,RH.EZUPTIMEZONE AS EZUPTIMEZONE_RH ,RD.EZUPTIME AS EZUPTIME_RD ,RD.EZUPTIMEZONE AS EZUPTIMEZONE_RD ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY DCRDV.GLBL_CMPY_CD ORDER BY DCRDV.CPO_ORD_NUM, TO_NUMBER(DCRDV.DS_ORD_POSN_NUM), RD.RWS_NUM, RD.RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM ) AS ROW_NUM FROM CPO CPO ,DS_ORD_TP DOP ,DS_ORD_CATG DOC ,DS_CPO_RTRN_DTL_V DCRDV ,DS_CPO_CONFIG DCC ,MDL_NM MN ,RWS_HDR RH ,RWS_DTL RD ,RWS_CPLT RC ,RWS_STS HRS ,RWS_STS DRS ,RTL_WH RW ,SHIP_TO_CUST STC ,SELL_TO_CUST SLTC ,MDSE MDSE ,RTRN_TRK_NTFY_GRP RTNG
,SVC_TASK ST
,VND V ,CARR_TP CT ,S21_PSN PSN ,SCHD_COORD_STS SCS ,ORD_AGING_BCKT OAB ,CARR_RSN CR ,RTRN_TRK_STS RTS ,SHPG_SVC_LVL SSL ,BIZ_PROC_LOG BPL WHERE CPO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #cMsg.glblCmpyCd_G1#
AND CPO.CPO_ORD_NUM LIKE #cMsg.rmaNum_H1#
AND CPO.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CPO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DOP.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND CPO.DS_ORD_TP_CD = DOP.DS_ORD_TP_CD AND DOP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CPO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DOC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND CPO.DS_ORD_CATG_CD = DOC.DS_ORD_CATG_CD AND DOC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CPO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DCRDV.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND CPO.CPO_ORD_NUM = DCRDV.CPO_ORD_NUM
AND ST.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND CPO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = ST.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND CPO.CPO_ORD_NUM = ST.RMA_NUM(+)
AND DCRDV.RTRN_LINE_DPLY_STS_CD = #cMsg.rtrnLineDplyStsCd_H1#
AND DCRDV.SLS_REP_OR_SLS_TEAM_TOC_CD LIKE #cMsg.slsRepBrCd_H1#
AND DCRDV.RQST_PICK_UP_DT >= #cMsg.rqstPickUpDt_HF#
AND DCRDV.RQST_PICK_UP_DT <= #cMsg.rqstPickUpDt_HT#
AND DCRDV.SER_NUM LIKE #cMsg.serNum_H1#
AND DCRDV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DCRDV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DCC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DCRDV.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK = DCC.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK AND DCC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DCC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = MN.T_GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND DCC.MDL_ID = MN.T_MDL_ID(+) AND MN.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND CPO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RH.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND CPO.CPO_ORD_NUM = RH.TRX_ORD_NUM
AND RH.RWS_NUM LIKE #cMsg.rwsNum_H1#
AND RH.FROM_LOC_CD LIKE #cMsg.shipToCustCd_H1#
AND RH.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK = #cMsg.svcConfigMstrPk_H1#
AND ( RH.PICK_UP_RQST_FLG = #flgOn# )
AND ( RH.PICK_UP_RQST_FLG = #flgOff# )
AND RH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RH.RWS_NUM = RC.RWS_NUM(+) AND RC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND RH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RH.RWS_NUM = RD.RWS_NUM AND DCRDV.DS_CPO_RTRN_LINE_NUM = RD.TRX_LINE_NUM AND DCRDV.DS_CPO_RTRN_LINE_SUB_NUM = RD.TRX_LINE_SUB_NUM
AND RD.RTL_WH_CD LIKE #cMsg.rtlWhCd_H1#
AND RD.RTL_SWH_CD LIKE #cMsg.rtlSwhCd_H1#
AND RD.ACTL_PICK_UP_DT >= #cMsg.actlPickUpDt_HF#
AND RD.ACTL_PICK_UP_DT <= #cMsg.actlPickUpDt_HT#
AND RD.CARR_CD LIKE #cMsg.carrCd_H1#
AND RD.SCHD_COORD_PSN_CD = #cMsg.psnCd_H1#
AND RD.SCHD_PICK_UP_DT >= #cMsg.schdPickUpDt_HF#
AND RD.SCHD_PICK_UP_DT <= #cMsg.schdPickUpDt_HT#
AND RD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = HRS.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RH.RWS_STS_CD = HRS.RWS_STS_CD
AND HRS.RWS_OPEN_FLG = #flgOn#
AND HRS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DRS.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RD.RWS_STS_CD = DRS.RWS_STS_CD
AND DRS.RWS_OPEN_FLG = #flgOn#
AND DRS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RW.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RD.RTL_WH_CD = RW.RTL_WH_CD AND RW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = STC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RH.FROM_LOC_CD = STC.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD AND STC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND STC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SLTC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND STC.SELL_TO_CUST_CD = SLTC.SELL_TO_CUST_CD AND SLTC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = MDSE.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RD.MDSE_CD = MDSE.MDSE_CD AND MDSE.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RTNG.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RD.RTRN_TRK_NTFY_GRP_CD = RTNG.RTRN_TRK_NTFY_GRP_CD(+) AND RTNG.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND RD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = V.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RD.CARR_CD = V.VND_CD(+) AND V.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND V.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CT.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND V.CARR_TP_CD = CT.CARR_TP_CD(+) AND CT.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND RD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PSN.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RD.SCHD_COORD_PSN_CD = PSN.PSN_CD(+) AND PSN.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND RD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SCS.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RD.SCHD_COORD_STS_CD = SCS.SCHD_COORD_STS_CD(+) AND SCS.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND CPO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = OAB.GLBL_CMPY_CD
AND OAB.ORD_AGING_BCKT_CD = #cMsg.ordAgingBcktCd_H1#
AND OAB.ORD_AGING_FROM_DAYS_AOT <= TO_DATE(#slsDt#,'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE(SUBSTR(CPO.ORD_BOOK_TS, 0, 8), 'YYYYMMDD') AND (OAB.ORD_AGING_THRU_DAYS_AOT >= TO_DATE(#slsDt#,'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE(SUBSTR(CPO.ORD_BOOK_TS, 0, 8), 'YYYYMMDD') OR OAB.ORD_AGING_THRU_DAYS_AOT IS NULL) AND OAB.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SHPG_ORD SO WHERE SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CPO.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SO.SO_NUM LIKE #cMsg.soNum_H1# AND SO.TRX_HDR_NUM = CPO.CPO_ORD_NUM AND SO.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' )
AND RD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CR.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RD.CARR_RSN_CD = CR.CARR_RSN_CD(+) AND CR.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND RD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RTS.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RD.RTRN_TRK_STS_CD = RTS.RTRN_TRK_STS_CD(+) AND RTS.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND RD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SSL.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RD.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD = SSL.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD(+) AND SSL.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND DCRDV.CPO_ORD_NUM = BPL.PRNT_DOC_ID(+) AND BPL.DOC_ID(+) = DCRDV.DS_CPO_RTRN_LINE_NUM || '.' || DCRDV.DS_CPO_RTRN_LINE_SUB_NUM AND BPL.SUB_SYS_ID(+) = #subSysId# AND BPL.PROC_ID(+) = #procId# AND BPL.DOC_TP_CD(+) = #docTpCc# AND BPL.EVENT_ID(+) = #eventId# ) WHERE ROW_NUM <= #rownum# ORDER BY ROW_NUM
,SVC_TASK_RCV_DT DESC ,SVC_TASK_RCV_TM DESC

SELECT PSN_NM ,UPD_USR_ID ,UPD_TM_TS ,RTRN_TRX_CMNT_TXT ,MAN_CRAT_FLG FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN PSN.PSN_FIRST_NM IS NOT NULL THEN TRIM(RTC.UPD_USR_ID || '(' || PSN.PSN_FIRST_NM || ' ' || PSN.PSN_LAST_NM || ')') WHEN AP.FIRST_NM IS NOT NULL THEN TRIM(RTC.UPD_USR_ID || '(' || AP.FIRST_NM || ' ' || AP.LAST_NM || ')') ELSE RTC.UPD_USR_ID END AS PSN_NM ,RTC.UPD_USR_ID ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(RTC.UPD_TS,1,14), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS UPD_TM_TS ,RTC.RTRN_TRX_CMNT_TXT ,#flgOff# AS MAN_CRAT_FLG FROM RTRN_TRX_CMNT RTC ,S21_PSN PSN ,AUTH_PSN AP WHERE RTC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #cMsg.glblCmpyCd_G1# AND RTC.MSG_CTRL_TP_CD = #msgCtrlTpCd# AND RTC.TRX_HDR_NUM = #cMsg.cpoOrdNum_C1# AND RTC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RTC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PSN.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RTC.UPD_USR_ID = PSN.PSN_CD(+) AND PSN.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND RTC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = AP.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RTC.UPD_USR_ID = AP.USR_NM(+) AND AP.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' ORDER BY RTC.UPD_TS DESC ,RTC.RTRN_TRX_CMNT_PK DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #rownum#

SELECT RLDS.RTRN_LINE_DPLY_STS_CD ,RLDS.RTRN_LINE_DPLY_STS_DESC_TXT FROM RTRN_LINE_DPLY_STS RLDS WHERE RLDS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RLDS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY RLDS.RTRN_LINE_DPLY_STS_SORT_NUM
SELECT RW.RTL_WH_NM FROM RTL_WH RW WHERE RW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RW.RTL_WH_CD LIKE #rtlWhCd# AND RW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT RS.RTL_SWH_NM FROM RTL_SWH RS WHERE RS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
AND RS.RTL_WH_CD LIKE #rtlWhCd#
AND RS.RTL_SWH_CD LIKE #rtlSwhCd# AND RS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
SELECT TOC.TOC_NM FROM TOC TOC WHERE TOC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND TOC.TOC_CD LIKE #tocCd# AND TOC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT PSN.EML_ADDR FROM SVC_TASK ST ,S21_PSN PSN WHERE ST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND ST.RMA_NUM = #rmaNum# AND ST.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PSN.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND ST.SVC_BR_MGR_PSN_CD = PSN.PSN_CD AND PSN.EML_ADDR IS NOT NULL AND PSN.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

WITH BR_TIER AS ( SELECT OHSD.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,OHSD.ORG_TIER_CD + 1 AS ORG_TIER_CD FROM STRU_DFN SDF ,ORG_HRCH_STRU_DFN OHSD WHERE SDF.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SDF.BR_FLG = 'Y' AND SDF.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SDF.GLBL_CMPY_CD = OHSD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SDF.STRU_DFN_CD = OHSD.STRU_DFN_CD AND OHSD.BIZ_AREA_ORG_CD = #service# AND OHSD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND OHSD.EFF_FROM_DT <= #slsDt# AND NVL(OHSD.EFF_THRU_DT, #slsDt#) >= #slsDt# AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ,BR_INFO AS ( SELECT CASE BR.ORG_TIER_CD WHEN 1 THEN SUBSTR(STRU.FIRST_ORG_NM, 1 ,3) WHEN 2 THEN SUBSTR(STRU.SCD_ORG_NM, 1 ,3) WHEN 3 THEN SUBSTR(STRU.THIRD_ORG_NM, 1 ,3) WHEN 4 THEN SUBSTR(STRU.FRTH_ORG_NM, 1 ,3) WHEN 5 THEN SUBSTR(STRU.FIFTH_ORG_NM, 1 ,3) WHEN 6 THEN SUBSTR(STRU.SIXTH_ORG_NM, 1 ,3) WHEN 7 THEN SUBSTR(STRU.SVNTH_ORG_NM, 1 ,3) WHEN 8 THEN SUBSTR(STRU.EIGHTH_ORG_NM, 1 ,3) WHEN 9 THEN SUBSTR(STRU.NINTH_ORG_NM, 1 ,3) WHEN 10 THEN SUBSTR(STRU.TENTH_ORG_NM, 1 ,3) WHEN 11 THEN SUBSTR(STRU.ELVTH_ORG_NM, 1 ,3) END BR_CD ,CASE BR.ORG_TIER_CD WHEN 1 THEN STRU.FIRST_ORG_CD WHEN 2 THEN STRU.SCD_ORG_CD WHEN 3 THEN STRU.THIRD_ORG_CD WHEN 4 THEN STRU.FRTH_ORG_CD WHEN 5 THEN STRU.FIFTH_ORG_CD WHEN 6 THEN STRU.SIXTH_ORG_CD WHEN 7 THEN STRU.SVNTH_ORG_CD WHEN 8 THEN STRU.EIGHTH_ORG_CD WHEN 9 THEN STRU.NINTH_ORG_CD WHEN 10 THEN STRU.TENTH_ORG_CD WHEN 11 THEN STRU.ELVTH_ORG_CD END BR_ORG_CD FROM ORG_STRU STRU ,BR_TIER BR WHERE STRU.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND STRU.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND STRU.FIRST_ORG_CD = #service# AND STRU.ORG_LAYER_NUM = BR.ORG_TIER_CD ) SELECT EML_ADDR FROM ( SELECT PSN.EML_ADDR FROM SVC_TASK ST ,SVC_MACH_MSTR SMM ,BR_INFO BR ,DS_ORG_UNIT ORG ,TOC_ORG_STRU_RELN RELN ,ORG_TOC_CHNG_RQST RQST ,ORG_FUNC_ASG ASG ,S21_PSN PSN WHERE ST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND ST.RMA_NUM = #rmaNum# AND ST.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SMM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND ST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK = SMM.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK AND SMM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SMM.FLD_SVC_BR_CD = BR.BR_CD AND BR.BR_ORG_CD = ORG.ORG_CD AND ORG.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ORG.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RELN.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND ORG.ORG_CD = RELN.ORG_CD AND ORG.ORG_STRU_TP_CD = RELN.ORG_STRU_TP_CD AND RELN.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RELN.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RQST.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RELN.TOC_CD = RQST.TOC_CD AND RELN.ORG_CD = RQST.ORG_CD AND RQST.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RQST.ORG_FUNC_ROLE_TP_CD = #orgFuncRoleTp# AND RQST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = ASG.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RQST.TOC_CD = ASG.TOC_CD AND (ASG.GNRN_TP_CD = #gnrnTpCurrent# OR ASG.GNRN_TP_CD = #gnrnTpFuture#) AND ASG.GNRN_TP_CD != #gnrnTpDelete# AND ASG.GNRN_TP_CD != '0' AND ASG.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ASG.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PSN.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND ASG.PSN_CD = PSN.PSN_CD AND PSN.EML_ADDR IS NOT NULL AND PSN.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY PSN.PSN_NUM, ASG.EFF_FROM_DT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT ST.SVC_TASK_NUM ,ST.FSR_NUM ,ST.SER_NUM ,STC.DS_ACCT_NM ,STC.FIRST_LINE_ADDR || DECODE(STC.SCD_LINE_ADDR, null, '', ' ' || STC.SCD_LINE_ADDR) || DECODE(STC.THIRD_LINE_ADDR, null, '', ' ' || STC.THIRD_LINE_ADDR) || DECODE(STC.FRTH_LINE_ADDR, null, '', ' ' || STC.FRTH_LINE_ADDR) || DECODE(STC.CTY_ADDR, null, '', ',' || STC.CTY_ADDR) || DECODE(STC.ST_CD, null, '', ',' || STC.ST_CD) || DECODE(STC.POST_CD, null, '', ' ' || STC.POST_CD) AS DEINS_LOC ,STC.CTRY_CD ,STC.POST_CD ,PSN.PSN_FIRST_NM ,PSN.PSN_MID_NM ,PSN.PSN_LAST_NM ,PSN.EML_ADDR ,PSN.OFC_TEL_NUM ,SMM.FLD_SVC_BR_CD FROM SVC_TASK ST ,SHIP_TO_CUST STC ,S21_PSN PSN ,SVC_MACH_MSTR SMM ,FSR_VISIT FV WHERE ST.RMA_NUM = #rmaNum# AND ST.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = STC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND ST.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD = STC.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD AND STC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = FV.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND ST.FSR_NUM = FV.FSR_NUM AND ST.SVC_TASK_NUM = FV.SVC_TASK_NUM AND FV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND FV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PSN.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND FV.TECH_CD = PSN.PSN_CD(+) AND PSN.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND ST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SMM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SMM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK = SMM.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK
SELECT ST.SVC_TASK_NUM ,ST.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK FROM SVC_TASK ST WHERE ST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND ST.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ST.RMA_NUM = #rmaNum#
